text: The BLS Playoff MVP, or Serbian League Playoff MVP, is the award bestowed to the player that is deemed to be the "Most Valuable Player" during the playoff of the Basketball League of Serbia. The Basketball League of Serbia is the top-tier level national men's professional club basketball league in Serbia. The award has existed and been awarded by the Serbian League since the 2006–07 season. ==Winners== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Season !! Player !! Team !! |- | 2006–07 || Milan Gurović || Crvena zvezda || |- | 2007–08 || Nikola Peković || Partizan || |- | 2008–09 || Novica Veličković || Partizan (2) || |- | 2009–10 || Bo McCalebb || Partizan (3) || |- | 2010–11 || Curtis Jerrells || Partizan (4) || |- | 2011–12 || Omar Thomas || Crvena zvezda (2) || |- | 2012–13 || Dragan Milosavljević || Partizan (5) || |- | 2013–14 || Bogdan Bogdanović || Partizan (6) || |- | 2014–15 || Milan Mačvan || Partizan (7) || |- | 2015–16 || Maik Zirbes || Crvena zvezda (3) || |- | 2016–17 || Ognjen Dobrić || Crvena zvezda (4) || |- | 2017–18 || Alen Omić || Crvena zvezda mts (5) || |- | 2018–19 || Billy Baron || Crvena zvezda mts (6) || |- | 2019–20 || colspan=2|Canceled due to COVID-19 pandemic in Serbia || |} ==See also== *ABA League Finals MVP ==References== ==External links== * Official website * Basketball League of Serbia at eurobasket.com Category:European basketball awards MVP Category:Most valuable player awards
title: BLS Playoff MVP
